text: Liu zai houfang de youmu renmen jiang shuo:`Women yao zhaoliao women de jiachan he jiashu, suoyi qing ni wei women qiurao.'Tamen yong tamen de shetou shuo de bushi tamen de xinli hua. Ni shuo:`Shui neng wei nimen ganshe zhenzhu yi sihao? Ruguo ta yao jiang huo yu nimen, huo jiang fu yu nimen. Zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
